Title: priit jagaa ke miit banaa ke bhuul na jaanaa
Lyrics: la	priit jagaa ke miit banaa ke bhuul na jaanaa ra	suno jii bhuul naa jaanaa	priit jagaa ke miit banaa ke bhuul na jaanaa la	suno jii bhuul naa jaanaa	ra	ho samaan hai pyaar kaa rut hai suhaanii la	dulhan banii hai raat kii raanii	dulhan banii hai raat kii raanii	ra	jiivan biinaa jab tak baaje ho yuun hii hilamil gaanaa la	suno jii bhuul naa jaanaa	phuul na kumhalaa jaae khil ke	phuul na kumhalaa jaae khil ke	ra	ho naa judaa	aapas men mil ke	aapas men mil ke	la	dhadakan ban ke dil men rahanaa aankhon men bas jaanaa ra	suno jii bhuul naa jaanaa	ra	aa badal naa jaanaa jag ke dar se la	bane hain saathii jiivan bhar ke	bane hain saathii jiivan bhar ke	ra	priit kii dushman hai ye duniyaa ho duniyaa ko thukaraanaa la	suno jii bhuul naa jaanaa do	priit jagaa ke

Title: baabuujii dhiire chalanaa pyaar men zaraa sanbhalanaa
Lyrics: baabuujii dhiire chalanaa pyaar men zaraa sambhalanaa haan bade dhokhe hain bade dhokhe hain is raah men baabuujii	kyuun ho khoye huye sar jhukaaye jaise jaate ho sab kuchh lutaaye ye to baabuujii pahalaa kadam hai nazar aate hain apane paraaye haan bade dhokhe hain	ye muhabbat hai o bholebhaale kar na dil ko gamon ke havaale kaam ulafat kaa naazuk bahut hai aake honthon pe tuutenge pyaale haan bade dhokhe hain	ho gayii hai kisii se jo anaban thaam le duusaraa koi daaman zindagaanii ki raahen ajab hain ho akelaa hai to laakhon hain dushman haan bade dhokhe hain

Title: rut phire par din hamaare
Lyrics: rut phire par din hamaare phire naa phire naa phire naa rut phire par din hamaare	dharti pe rang chhaayaa duniyaa ke bhaag jaage lekin vahii andheraa ab tak hai apane aage2	rut phire par din hamaare	pahunchii naa apanii naiyyaaab tak kisii kinaare2	koii nahiin jo hamako apanii taraf pukaare is paar kuchh nahiin hai us paar kuchh nahiin hai apane liye sivaae majhadhaar kuchh nahiin hai2	rut phire par din hamaare

Title: chaand phir nikalaa magar tum na aaye
Lyrics: chaand phir nikalaa magar tum na aaye jalaa phir meraa dil karun kyaa main haay chaand phir nikalaa	ye raat kahatii hai vo din gaye tere	ye jaanataa hai dil ke tum nahiin mere	ye jaanataa hai dil ke tum nahiin mere	khadii main huun phir bhii nigaahen bichhaaye main kyaa karuun haay ke tum yaad aaye chaand phir nikalaa	sulagate siine se dhunaa saa uthataa hai lo ab chale aao ke dam ghutataa hain	sulagate siine se dhunaa saa uthataa hai lo ab chale aao ke dam ghutataa hain	jalaa gaye tan ko bahaaron ke saaye main kyaa karun haay ke tum yaad aaye chaand phir nikalaa

Title: naarangii le lo jii koii naarangii le lo
Lyrics: naarangii le lo jii koii naarangii le lo khattii le lo miithii le lo aur le lo rasadaar isakii kaliikalii men bhar laayii main dil kaa pyaar	naa dekho saiyaan meraa rang	naa dekho saiyaan meraa rang	naarangii dekho dekho ye naarangii dekho aa jaaye dil men jo tarang to naarangii dekho dekho ye naarangii dekho jii	vaah vaah

Title: shamaa pe aake o paravaane
Lyrics: printitle	aa shamaa pe aake o paravaane	jal ko jal aa jal ko jal jal jal jal aa pyaar ke raste hansate hansate	chal ko chal aa chal ko chal chal chal chal	aa pankh jalenge kaak banegii	jalake muhabbat paak banegii	soch na muurakh biit rahaa hai	pal ko pal aa pal ko pal pal pal pal	aa mahafil kaa yuun rang jamaa de	tan ko apane aag lagaa de	terii raak se shammaa banegii	kal ko kal aa kal ko kal kal kal kal	aa thodii sii ab raat hai baakii	shiishen khaalii so gayaa saakii	pyaar kii gaafil apanii ankhiyaan	mal ko mal aa mal ko mal mal mal mal

Title: bade armaanon se rakhaa hai balam terii kasam
Lyrics: bade armaanon se rakhaa hai balam terii kasam o balam terii kasam pyaar kii duniyaa men ye pahalaa kadam ho pahalaa kadam judaa na kar sakenge hamako zamaane ke sitam ho zamaane ke sitam pyaar kii duniyaa men ye pahalaa kadam ho pahalaa kadam	le uthaa pyaar bhii angadaaii hai dil bhii jahaan ajii aise men lie jaate ho tum bolo kahaan duur duniyaa kii nigaahon se kahiin jaaenge ham pyaar kii duniyaa men ye pahalaa kadam ho pahalaa kadam	terii do aankhon men dikahte hain mujhe donon jahaan inhii men kho gayaa dil meraa kaho dhuundhuun kahaan chaand ghatataa ho ghate apanii mohabbat na ho kam pyaar kii duniyaa men ye pahalaa kadam ho pahalaa kadam	merii naiyaa ko kinaare kaa intazaar nahiin teraa aanchal ho to patavaar bhii darakaar nahiin tere hote hue kyon ho mujhe tuufaan kaa gam pyaar kii duniyaa men ye pahalaa kadam ho pahalaa kadam

Title: kushii ke phuul lie aa gae bahaar ke din
Lyrics: kushii ke phuul lie aa gae bahaar ke din yahii bahaar ke din ab banenge pyaar ke din	o raajaa aaj machaa le dhuum main bhii jhuumuun tuu bhii jhuum kal kii kabar kisako maaluum chham chham	o raajaa singaar sajaae rut kii raanii aaii hans le gaale mauj banaa le raat suhaanii aa gaii duniyaa men machaa de dhuum	tuu bhanvaraa ban ke ghuum aur ek phuul par jhuum chham chham	o diivaane kisii kaa ho jaa zulfon kii chhaayaa men so jaa jaamemuhabbat pii kar jhuum kal kii chham chham chham

Title: pyaar kii nishaaniyaan sunaayen ye kahaaniyaan

Title: kisii naragisii nazar ko dil denge ham

Lyrics: ta ek din haatimetaai se kisiine puuchhaa kyuun musiibat men giraftaar tuu rahataa hai sadaa ba duusaron ke lie kyuun phirataa hai maaraa maaraa bole kuchh aur nahiin jaanataa huun isake siwaa ta jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa ta ek nekii ik bhalaaii ik duaa le jaauungaa ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa	ta chaar din kii zindagaanii aur duniyaa chand roz chaar din kii ye saraa hai jisamen rahanaa chand roz ba kyuun na kar jaauun jahaan men naam apanaa chand roz ko kyuun na kar jaauun jahaan men naam apanaa chand roz ta ek apanaa naam yaa apanaa pataa le jaauungaa ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa ta ek nekii ik bhalaaii ik duaa le jaauungaa ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa	ba maut ke tuufaan men insaan jab bah jaaegaa hiiraa motii sonaa chaandii sab yahiin rah jaaegaa ta jaate jaate jaane waalaa bas yahii kah jaaegaa ko jaate jaate jaane waalaa bas yahii kah jaaegaa ta main yahaan laayaa thaa kyaa aur saath kyaa le jaauungaa ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa ta ek nekii ik bhalaaii ik duaa le jaauungaa ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa	ta kaak kaa putalaa huun main aur kaak men mil jaauungaa ba biij jaise bouungaa vaise hii phal main paauungaa ta ab nahiin sochaa to marate dam bahut pachhataauungaa ko ab nahiin sochaa to marate dam bahut pachhataauungaa ta daamanehastii gunaahon se bharaa le jaauungaa	ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa ta ek nekii ik bhalaaii ik duaa le jaauungaa ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa ta ba ko jab yahaan se jaauungaa main aur kyaa le jaauungaa

Lyrics: jahaan kahiin diipak jalataa hai vahaan patangaa bhii aataa hai priit kii riit yahii hai muurakh tuu kaahe pachhataataa hai paravaane kii naadaanii par duniyaa hansatii hai to hanse pyaar kii miithii aag men premii hansate hansate jal jaataa hai	jo ik baar kah do ke tum ho hamaare to badale ye duniyaa badalen nazaare jo ik baar kah do	aakaash men aakaash men chaand taare hansen hamaare hii dil men andheraa base nigaahon kii galiyon men chorii se aake jo tum muskuraa do to khil jaayen taare jo ik baar kah do	suhaanii hai ye suhaanii hai ye zindagii pyaar se hai muurakh jo pachhataaye dil haar ke ye baazii hai duniyaa men sabase niraalii jo haare so jiite jo jiite vo haare jo ik baar kah do

Title: chalchal re musaafir chal tuu is duniyaa se chal
Lyrics: chalchal re musaafir chal tuu is duniyaa se chal jahaan dil kaa ik ishaaraa ho aur duniyaa jaae badal chalchal re musaafir	mastii bharii havaaen jis galii men jaaen phuul khilaaen ye madahosh nigaahen jisape atak jaaen apanaa banaaen jahaan pyaar kaa rastaa koii na roke koii na kahe sambhal chalchal re musaafir	ruup kii pyaasii aankhen dil men aramaan sau tuufaan aakir kabhii to hogii tumase pahachaan o anajaan kabhii to rimajhim barasenge ye rang bare baadal	chalchal re musaafir	pyaar kii riit niraalii jo mausam jaae jaa ke naa aae dam bhar kii ujiyaalii jab din dhal jaae dil ghabaraae jahaan ujade naa singaar kisii kaa phaile naa kaajal chalchal re musaafir

Title: chhamchham ghungharuu bole
Lyrics: chhamchham ghungharuu bole merii chaal nashiilii dole man gaane lagaa samajhaane lagaa tuu aaj kisii kii ho le	chhamchham ghungharuu bole merii chaal nashiilii dole man gaane lagaa samajhaane lagaa tuu aaj kisii kii ho le	chhamchham ghungharuu	jab se tuu dil men samaane lagaa zindagii men nayaa mazaa aane lagaa	jab se tuu dil men samaane lagaa zindagii men nayaa mazaa aane lagaa	badalii hai chaal khil gae gaal aankhon men savaal bikhare hain baal chhamchham ghungharuu	yaad rahe piyaa meraa pyaar sachchaa jii phir kabhii aapase milenge achchhaa jii	yaad rahe piyaa meraa pyaar sachchaa jii phir kabhii aapase milenge achchhaa jii	aapake gulaam dete hain salaam dekh liyaa naach laao jii inaam chhamchham ghungharuu

Title: jaan sake to jaan tere man men chhupakar baithe
Lyrics: jaan sake to jaan tere man men chhupakar baithe dekh tere bhagavaan jaan sake to	sadiyaan biitiin lekin teraa diip na bujhane paayaa terii puunjii man kii daulat sabase uunchii maayaa	siitaa jaisii shakti tujhamen	siitaa jaisii shakti tujhamen	paarvatii sii aan jaan sake to	koii na teraa na koii meraa saare naate jhuuthe tuute dil kii aas to kyaa aas na usakii chhuute	vahii sachchaa teraa svaamii	vahii sachchaa teraa svaamii	maan are insaan jaan sake to	ghar bhii chhuutaa dar bhii chhuutaa dhuundhe rainbaseraa gam ke gahare baadal chhaae chaaron or andheraa nirdhan ke dukhdard ko kyon kar jaan sake dhanavaan jaan sake to	nain andheraa rastaa suunaa bhatake jaa dukhiyaarii tere dil kii raakh men jalatii aaj bhii ik chingaarii haar na qismat kabhii to hogii raah terii aasaan jaan sake to	paapon kii apane dekho muurkh aap sazaa hai paataa jo bhii siidhii raah men bhatake jod na usase naataa dil men laakhon tuufaan jaage aankh na lekin roe karm kaa paalan karane vaalii aan apanii khoe dekhodekho mamataa	pyaar kaa de balidaan	pyaar kaa de balidaan	jaan sake to

Title: salaam tujhako ai duniyaa ab aakarii hai salaam
Lyrics: salaam tujhako ai duniyaa ab aakarii hai salaam chhalakane waalaa hai ab merii zindagii kaa jaam ab aakarii hai salaam	har ek aansuu bataataa hai kuun dil kaa huaa har ek aah sunaatii hai maut kaa paigaam ab aakarii hai salaam	har ek hichakii hai nashtar harek saans hai tiir huaa hai chupake hii chupake jigar kaa kaam tamaam ab aakarii hai salaam	idhar jo shamma jalii to udhar patangaa jalaa hai diljalon kii muhabbat kaa ek hii anjaam ab aakarii hai salaam

Title: chalo chalen maan sapanon ke gaanv men

Title: dil kaa haal sune dilavaalaa siidhii sii baat na mirch masaalaa

Title: andhon pe dayaa karanaa daataa
Lyrics: andhon pe dayaa karanaa daataa apanii aankhon kii tumako qasam is jholii ko bharanaa daata apanii aankhon kii tumako qasam	chhin jaatii hai jinakii ye jyotii rah jaate hain thokar khaane ko2	lut jaatii hai unakii sab khushiyaan gam rahataa hai dil bahalaane ko2	andhon pe dayaa karanaa daataa	hamase na churaao na yuun aankhen is dharatii kii hii santaan hain ham2	mohataaj sahii laachaar sahii phir bhii to are inasaan hain ham2	andhon pe dayaa karanaa daataa	ai maalik tuu apanii duniyaa men kisii bande ko yuun majabuur na kar2	dene ko to de de har dukhadaa ye aankhen magar benuur na kar andhon pe dayaa karanaa daataa

Lyrics: aa gaye more piyaa naach rahaa hai moraa jiyaa pyaar ne dil le liyaa jiine na diyaa haay luut liyaa	aa gaye more piyaa naach rahaa hai moraa jiyaa pyaar ne dil le liyaa jiine na diyaa haay luut liyaa	aa gaye more piyaa	aa gaii hain kaalii raaten kaalii raaten jhuum rahii hain barasaaten barasaaten	aa gaii hain kaalii raaten kaalii raaten jhuum rahii hain barasaaten barasaaten	bholepan kii baaten yaad aayen piyaa haay luut liyaa	bholepan kii baaten yaad aayen piyaa haay luut liyaa	jaan lagii ghabaraane pyaar lagaa pachhataane kaun hamaaraa gam jaane yaad naa tuune kiyaa haay luut liyaa	jaan lagii ghabaraane pyaar lagaa pachhataane kaun hamaaraa gam jaane yaad naa tuune kiyaa haay luut liyaa	aa gaye more piyaa

Title: tere raaste pe ham ne ik ghar banaa liyaa hai
Lyrics: tere raaste pe ham ne ik ghar banaa liyaa hai terii muskuraahaton se is ko sajaa liyaa hai tere raaste pe ham ne	aane se tere pahale aataa hai ek ishaaraa suuraj ke pahale jaise ik roshanii kii dhaaraa ham ne yahii ishaaraa dil men basaa liyaa hai tere raaste pe ham ne	tere ghar se duur kyon hain terii zindagii kii raahen mere dil kii dhadakanon men tere giit terii aahen terii roshanii se dil kaa diipak jalaa liyaa hai tere raaste pe ham ne	terii paayalon kii chhamchham mere giit men samaayii merii aarazuu ne saragam terii naam se sajaayii chhotii sii is adaa ko nagamaa banaa liyaa hai tere raaste pe ham ne

Title: suno chhotii sii gudiyaa kii lambii kahaanii
Lyrics: suno chhotii sii gudiyaa kii lambii kahaanii	suno chhotii sii gudiyaa kii lambii kahaanii	jaise taaron kii baat sune raat suhaanii suno chhotii sii	jisakii qismat men gam ke bichhaune the aansuu hii khilaune the dard kii kushiyaan thiin dukh bharii ankhiyaan thiin ghar bhii na thaa koii aur dar bhii na thaa koii bhare aanchal men gam chhipaae aankhon men paanii suno chhotii sii	dil men ye aramaan the ik chhotaa saa bangalaa ho chaandii kii diivaaren ho aur sone kaa jangalaa ho khel hon jiivan ke yahaan mel hon jiivan ke	dil men ye aramaan the ik chhotaa saa bangalaa ho chaandii kii diivaaren ho aur sone kaa jangalaa ho khel hon jiivan ke yahaan mel hon jiivan ke	ho gayaa bachapan to aansuu bharii aaii javaanii suno chhotii sii	chaand kaa dolaa ho bijalii kaa baajaa ho dole pe raanii ho ghode pe raajaa ho pyaar ke raste hon aur phuul barasate hon	chaand kaa dolaa ho bijalii kaa baajaa ho dole pe raanii ho ghode pe raajaa ho pyaar ke raste hon aur phuul barasate hon	ho bananaa chaahatii thii ik din vo taaron kii raanii suno chhotii sii	tuut gae pal bhar men sapanon ke motii bhii lut gaii jyoti bhii rah gae andhere ujade hue sabere baat yah puurii thii phir bhii adhuurii thii	tuut gae pal bhar men sapanon ke motii bhii lut gaii jyoti bhii rah gae andhere ujade hue sabere baat yah puurii thii phir bhii adhuurii thii	ho hogaa anjaam kyaa kabar kuchh bhii na jaanii suno chhotii sii	aaii kushiyaan bhii pyaar kii raaton par ithalaatii havaaon par gam ke hate baadal chaand banii paayal jam ke bahaaren aaiin aur jhuum ke laharaaiin	aaii kushiyaan bhii pyaar kii raaton par ithalaatii havaaon par gam ke hate baadal chaand banii paayal jam ke bahaaren aaiin aur jhuum ke laharaaiin	ho hanse aanchal men taare rut aaii suhaanii suno chhotii sii	sach hue aakir aramaan bhare sapane giit baniin aahen aur ban gae sab apane gair kii duniyaa aur ban gae sab apane yah hai jiivan kii gati aur dil kii javaanii suno chhotii sii	suno chhotii sii gudiyaa kii kahaanii
